verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You gave to me great victories
Anointed me with unfailing love
Your help oh God has made me great

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You're the one who saved me from my foes
Set my table before them
You give strength to run the race

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
For this I praise Your name
For all that You have done
For this I praise Your name
With all my heart
You are my rock
You are my strength
You are my rock
I praise you again and again

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
My Rock
My strength, My Rock
I praise you again and again
For this I praise Your name
For all that You have done
For this I praise Your name
With all my heart
